pages.text_verbatim_title_block:
PROJECT NAME: BROPHY RESIDENCE
LIVING RM ADDITION
1181 DALMAGARRY RD. LONDON
PROJECT NO.: 24-069
DATE: 12/12/24
DRAWN BY: M. HARTMAN
SHEET NO.: SP1
SHEET: 1 OF 1
pages.general_notes_verbatim:
FRONT YARD SET BACK: 4.5M
INTERIOR SIDE YARD SET BACK: 1.2M
EXTERIOR SIDE YARD SET BACK: 3.0M
TOTAL PERMITTED LOT COVERAGE: 35%
TOTAL LOT AREA: 359M2
EXIST BUILDING AREA: 114M2
PROPOSED BUILDING AREA: 14M2
PROPOSED TOTAL LOT COVERAGE: 35%
FINISHED SITE GRADING
AS PER OBC TABLE 9.14.6.3.
THE BUILDING SHALL BE LOCATED AND THE
BUILDING SITE GRADED SO THAT WATER
WILL NOT ACCUMULATE AT OR NEAR THE
BUILDING AND WILL NOT ADVERSELY
AFFECT ADJACENT PROPERTIES.
EXTERIOR FOUNDATION WALLS SHALL BE
EXTENDED NOT LESS THAN 150MM
ABOVE FINISHED GROUND LEVEL.
pages.page_overview_summary: This site plan provides an overview of the property layout for the Brophy Residence, including the existing and proposed building footprints. It shows the property boundaries, setbacks, and the location of the driveway and sidewalk. The plan includes notes on site grading and zoning requirements, ensuring compliance with local regulations. The overall layout is designed to prevent water accumulation near the building and to maintain proper drainage.

PROJECT NAME: BROPHY RESIDENCE
LIVING RM ADDITION
1181 DALMAGARRY RD. LONDON

pages.general_notes_verbatim:
FOUNDATION NOTES
ALL CONCRETE WALLS 8" THK (TYP) U.N.O.
ALL FOOTINGS 20" WIDE X 10" DEEP (TYP)
REFER TO PLAN FOR FOOTING SIZES
ALL FOOTINGS ARE BASED ON
ASSUMED SOIL BEARING OF 1500 PSF
ALL FOOTINGS SHALL BEAR ON
UNDISTURBED SOIL OR ENGINEERED FILL
ALL FOOTINGS SHALL BE STEPPED
WHERE REQUIRED TO MAINTAIN
MIN. 4'-0" COVER OVER FOOTINGS
ALL FOOTINGS SHALL BEAR ON
CONCRETE FOUNDATION WALLS
